summary: Major hyperscalers (Meta, Microsoft, Google, AWS) have significantly increased their 2024/2025 Capex guidance, with Meta raising to $35-40B, Microsoft prioritizing cloud/AI infrastructure, and Alphabet exceeding expectations. GPU rental prices remain stable/high at $3.13/hr, indicating sustained demand. Rumors of GPT-5 (Q3/Q4 2024) and Gemini 2 releases are driving further market optimism.
